outputs.output_descr: The Project aims at strengthening the capacities of the Alagoas Development Agency (AFAL), as the articulator of inclusive production development plans and programmes in the State of Alagoas. This initiative responds to the need of addressing the structural limitations affecting development plans implementation in Alagoas, as well as to support the national initiatives in this state and the opportunities arising from those. The programme will strengthen AFALs capacities as well as those of the key stakeholder in order to facilitate the implementation of strategic development plans, programmes and projects. Further it will seek to facilitate strategic partnerships development aimed at ensuring sustainability

donor_name: MINISTRY  OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS & COOPERATION OF SPAIN

project_title: BRA/09/003 Institut Strengthening of Local Dev in Alagoa
